testcaseName: Zoster: Patient is overdue at 62 years of age for Zoster dose
generalDescription: This test case describes when a patient is 62 years of age and has not been administered a Zoster vaccine, that dose 1 (Shingrix) of the 2 dose series should be forecasted.
reasonForChange:
V3.4: Test case updated to accommodate new ACIP Zoster recommendations.
V2.0: New test case for version 2.0 which expanded scope into Adult recommendations
